select cuid, related_ne_cuid from (select p.cuid, p.related_ne_cuid, p.port_no from ptp p,an_onu na,nms_system n where exists (select 1 from gpon_cover gc where na.related_cab_cuid = gc.related_ne_cuid and gc.standard_addr = #{id}) and p.related_ne_cuid = na.cuid and n.cuid = na.related_ems_cuid and n.ownership = 1 and p.port_state = 1 and p.port_sub_type = 37 and dev_type = 2) order by port_no asc
